oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Altar and pulpit of a Coptic Church in Old Cairo
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: G. Lekegian - Phot. Art. G. Lekegian & Co.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photographer's description: Eglise Copthe au vieux Caire (El-Méalaka) No.238. Translation of photographer's description: Coptic Church of Old Cairo (El-Méalaka) No.238. Collector's note: Kanissa al-Muallaqa.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Orthodox churches, Coptic Architecture
columns (architectural elements)
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Misr el Qadima, Coptic Cairo, Al-Qāhirah governorate, Egypt, Africa
oai_dc:dc.dc:date: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
